translations: v．预先警告，预告：提前告知某人可能发生的危险或不愉快的事情。
· She forewarned him of the difficulties he would face.
她预先警告他，他将面临困难。

sentences.sentence: The commander had been forewarned of the attack.
sentences.translation: 指挥官预先得到敌人要发动袭击的警告。

sentences.sentence: The travel guide had forewarned me of what to expect.
sentences.translation: 该导游已经把将要发生的事情提前告知了我。

sentences.sentence: Be forewarned: popular search terms will yield a lot of messages!
sentences.translation: 警告：流行搜索词汇可能会导致很多信息！
